text: The Apple was a short-lived American automobile manufactured by the Apple Automobile Company in Dayton, Ohio, from 1915 to 1917. The Apple 8 model cost $1,150 and had 44 horsepower. ==See also== * List of defunct United States automobile manufacturers * Dayton Electric, an early Dayton area automobile manufacturer * Speedwell Motor Car Company, an early Dayton area automobile manufacturer ==References== ==External links== * Dossier on Apple Motors Category:Defunct motor vehicle manufacturers of the United States Category:Defunct companies based in Dayton, Ohio Category:Motor vehicle manufacturers based in Ohio Category:Vintage vehicles
title: Apple (automobile)
